qas.question: Who composed GE's slogan "Imagination at work?"?
What was GE's slogan prior to "Imagination at work?"

answers.text: We Bring Good Things to Life

qas.question: In what year was the slogan "We Bring Good Things to Life" first used?
Which company designed the standard format for GE's marketing literature and website?
What is the name of the typeface family created for GE in 2014?

answers.text: GE Sans and Serif by Bold Monday

qas.question: In what year did GE start using the slogan, "Imagination at work"?
What was the first typeface family use by GE?
Who composed the slogan, "We Bring Good Things to Life"?
What was the typeface used for, "We Bring Good Things to Life"?
Who created the GE Inspira font?

context: The changes included a new corporate color palette, small modifications to the GE logo, a new customized font (GE Inspira) and a new slogan, "Imagination at work", composed by <a0_0><b7_0>David Lucas<b7_0/><a0_0/>, to replace the slogan "<a1_0>We Bring Good Things to Life<a1_0/>" used since <a2_0><b5_0>1979<b5_0/><a2_0/>. The standard requires many headlines to be lowercased and adds visual "white space" to documents and advertising. The changes were designed by <a3_0>Wolff Olins<a3_0/> and are used on GE's marketing, literature and website. In 2014, a second typeface family was introduced: <a4_0><b6_0><b8_0>GE Sans<b8_0/> and Serif<b6_0/> by Bold Monday<a4_0/> created under art direction by <b9_0>Wolff Olins<b9_0/>.
